## Publications

<br>

```{r}
#| label: refs
#| output: asis
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

# Load packages
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(RefManageR)
  library(dplyr)
  library(tibble)
  library(stringr)
})


# Set an ample width to prevent titles etc. from getting wrapped
options(width = 500)

# Function to make text DOIs into hyperlinks
doi_to_hyperlink <- function(x) {
  str_remove_all(x, "\\.$") |>
  str_replace_all(
    regex("(https://doi.org/)(10\\.\\d{4,9}/[-._;()/:A-Z0-9]+)", ignore_case = TRUE),
    "[\\2](\\1\\2)"
  )
}

# Get zotero user ID and API key
zotero_user_id <- Sys.getenv("ZOTERO_USER_ID")

zoter_api_key <- Sys.getenv("ZOTERO_API_KEY")

# Download Zotero data
refs_raw <- ReadZotero(
  user = zotero_user_id,
  .params = list(
    tag = "nitta-pubs",
    key = zoter_api_key
  )
)

# Convert to dataframe and parse (mostly removing latex fields)
refs_df <-
  refs_raw |>
  as_tibble() |>
  select(bibtype, title, volume, doi, number, journal, author, month, year, pages) |>
  mutate(
    title = title |>
      # converts latex italics to markdown italics
      str_replace_all("\\\\textit\\{([^}]*)\\}", "*\\1*") |>
      str_remove_all(coll("{\\textless}span")) |>
      str_remove_all(coll("{\\textgreater}")) |>
      str_remove_all(coll('class=\"nocase\"')) |>
      str_remove_all(coll("\\textless")) |>
      str_remove_all(coll("/span")) |>
      str_remove_all(coll("{")) |>
      str_remove_all(coll("}")) |>
      str_squish(),
    author = author |>
      str_remove_all(coll("{")) |>
      str_remove_all(coll("}")) |>
      str_squish(),
    doi = case_when(
      is.na(doi) ~ NA_character_,
      .default = glue::glue("https://doi.org/{doi}")
    )
  )

# convert back to bibentry
suppressWarnings(
  refs_bibent <- as.BibEntry(refs_df)
)

# set bibentry style
style <- list(
  style = "text",
  bib.style = "authoryear", 
  max.names = 50,
  dashed = FALSE, 
  sorting = "ydnt")

# capture printed output as char vec
bib_list <- capture.output(print(refs_bibent, .opts = style))

# A few more modifications
bib_list <- bib_list[bib_list != ""] |>
  # Make my name bold
  str_replace_all("J. H. Nitta", "**J. H. Nitta**") |>
  str_replace_all("Nitta, J. H.", "**Nitta, J. H.**") |>
  # software title formatting
  str_replace_all("dwctaxon", "`dwctaxon`") |>
  # DOIs as hyperlinks
  doi_to_hyperlink()

# Print as list
cat(paste("1.", bib_list), sep = "\n")
```
